description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com
ASUS Proart PZ13 https://go.magik.ly/ml/24z98/ (affiliate link)

ASUS's Proart line has really been impressing me lately. They make creator products and they know what details to pay attention to. The PZ13 is a Surface Pro like laptop that I think provides more bang for the buck with it's new Snapdragon X Plus processor and OLED screen.
